<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shrouded Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2503) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fetchling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=300" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 86 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Choose one cantrip from the [occult spell list](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3). You can cast this cantrip as an occult innate spell at will, heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
name: Shrouded Magic
